io.github.iwyfewwnt.uwutils

Class UwReflect

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.iwyfewwnt.uwutils.UwReflect

  • public final class UwReflect
extends Object
    A reflection utility.

    UwReflect is the utility class that provide functionality to operate with Java Reflection API.

        types - array of constructor argument types
        Returns:
        constructor or null

      • getConstructorOrNull

        public static <T> Constructor<T> getConstructorOrNull(Class<T> clazz)
        Safely get default constructor of the provided class or return null.

        Wraps getConstructorOrElse(Class, Constructor) w/ null as the default value.

        Type Parameters:
        T - object type
        Parameters:
        clazz - class from which get the constructor
        Returns:
        constructor or null

      • newInstanceOrElse

        public static <T> T newInstanceOrElse(Class<T> clazz,
                                      Class<?>[] argumentTypes,
                                      Object[] argumentValues,
                                      T defaultValue)
        Safely create a new instance of the provided class or return a default value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - object type
        Parameters:
        clazz - class from which create the new instance
        argumentTypes - array of constructor argument types
        argumentValues - array of constructor argument values
        defaultValue - default value to return on failure
        Returns:
        new instance or the default value
